oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Validation of Immulite 2000XPI chemiluminescent immunoassay for cattle serum progesterone measurement
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Megahed, A. A.
Jones, K.
Bisinotto, R. S.
Pohler, K.
Bittar, J. H. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Monitoring circulating progesterone concentration (P4) is an important component of basic and applied reproduction re足search and clinical settings. Radioimmunoassay (RIA) is con足sidered the gold standard method for measuring P4 in cattle blood, but it generates radioactive waste, has low throughput, and requires licensed facilities. Immulite速 2000XPI (Siemens) is a fully automated immunoassay system marketed for human use to measure concentrations of different analytes including P4. Our objectives were therefore to: 1) validate cattle serum P4 measurement with the Immulite 2000XPI; 2) characterize the analytical performance of the Immulite 2000XPI P4 immunoas足say (IPI) across the reportable concentration range.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 55 (2022): 2022 Annual Conference Proceedings; 212
